title: Summer Festival!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Summer festivals are the best~~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s great to have fun with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Totally! I wish Aqours could perform at a festival like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I wish μ’s could too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let’s ask the rest about it later!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! Kyaah, is this water!? Look, Chika-san, they’re handing out water guns over there. Should we check it out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You’re right! I’d love to soak in water with all this sweat on me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? You want to get soaked by the water guns....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Don’t you think it’ll feel really nice when it’s this hot?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....You have a point. Alright, let’s get drenched, Chika-san~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
